plot: Survivors of a strange infection bringing the dead back to life struggle to find safety from the outbreak and from their consciences.
title: The Invisible Atomic Monsters from Mars

plot_en: Survivors of a strange infection bringing the dead back to life struggle to find safety from the outbreak and from their consciences.
